Question: In 1865, the nine-year-old this person entered the Leopoldstädter Kommunal-Realgymnasium, a prominent high school.
Hints: It has been suggested that much of this person's early psychoanalytical theory was a by-product of his cocaine use.
The last and decisive word was always spoken by this person himself.
The origin of this person's early work with psychoanalysis can be linked to Josef Breuer.
